plugin.name: Web of Science Reviewer Recognition
plugin.summary: This plugin enables integration with Web of Science Reviewer Recognition Service. To install and use this plugin you must first purchase the Web of Science Reviewer Recognition Service subscription.
plugin.description:
Web of Science Reviewer Recognition Service is a third-party workflow solution allowing you to provide your reviewers with the opportunity to gain recognition for their reviews on Web of Science.

To install and use this plugin you must first purchase the Web of Science Reviewer Recognition Service. To do this please register your interest by emailing Clarivate. The Clarivate team will then be in touch to discuss your options and provide further instructions on how to integrate your journal with Web of Science Reviewer Recognition.
